A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Seriously\, if the movie is not going to remain faithful to the series why calling it Star Wars in the first place? Just change the name and say \"It is inspired by Star Wars\" or something. This movie has 1% of the essence of Star Wars. It doesn't deserve any stars. I was so excited when I found out about this movie and it was such a disappointment. (btw I saw the movie a long time ago but I am making a review until today because... why not?)
